languages.text: [Обратиться к сопровождающим] "Воспитание оставляет желать лучшего. Надеюсь, из них сделают достойных слуг династии фон Валанциус. Аудиенция окончена".
[Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к сопровождающим] "Воспитание оставляет желать лучшего. Надеюсь, из них сделают достойных слуг династии фон Валанциус. Аудиенция окончена".

traits.locale_text: [Address the chaperones] "These children's upbringing leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be molded into worthy servants of the von Valancius dynasty. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "These children's upbringing leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be molded into worthy servants of the von Valancius dynasty. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."

languages.text: [对陪护人员讲话] “他们的行为举止仍然有待改进，我希望你们能把他们塑造成与冯·瓦兰修斯家族相称的仆人。这场会面到此结束。”
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [对陪护人员讲话] “这些孩子们的行为举止仍然有待改进，我希望你们能把他们塑造成与冯·瓦兰修斯家族相称的仆人。这场会面结束了。”

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los supervisores] «Su comportamiento deja mucho que desear. Espero que lleguen a ser dignos de servir a la casa von Valancius. Esta audiencia ha terminado».
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los supervisores] «El comportamiento de estos niños deja mucho que desear. Espero que lleguen a ser dignos de servir a la casa von Valancius. Esta audiencia ha terminado».

languages.text: [付添人に指示する]「彼らの品行方正さには、大いに期待が持てる。{mf|俺|私}は、彼らがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の立派なしもべになることを望んでいる。この謁見は終わりだ」
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [付添人に指示する]「彼らの品行方正さには、大いに期待が持てる。{mf|俺|私}は、彼らがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の立派なしもべになることを望んでいる。この謁見は終わりだ」

languages.text: [Die Aufsichtspersonen ansprechen] "Das Verhalten dieser Kinder lässt einiges zu wünschen übrig. Ich hoffe, sie werden zu würdigen Dienern des Hauses von Valancius geformt. Die Audienz ist beendet."
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Die Aufsichtspersonen ansprechen] "Das Verhalten dieser Kinder lässt einiges zu wünschen übrig. Ich hoffe, sie werden zu würdigen Dienern des Hauses von Valancius geformt. Die Audienz ist beendet."

languages.text: [Vous adresser aux accompagnateurs] « Leur comportement laisse grandement à désirer. J'espère que vous saurez en faire des serviteurs dignes de la maison von Valancius. L'audience est terminée. »
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser aux accompagnateurs] « Le comportement de ces enfants laisse grandement à désirer. J'espère que vous saurez en faire des serviteurs dignes de la maison von Valancius. L'audience est terminée. »

languages.text: [Refakatçilere hitap et] "Tavırlarına çekidüzen verilmesi gerekiyor. Günün birinde von Valancius Hanesi'ne yaraşır hizmetkârlara dönüşmelerini umut ediyorum."
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Their comportment leaves much to be desired. I hope that they will be moulded into worthy servants of House von Valancius. This audience is over."
